means: 生育，生产( inbreed的过去式和过去分词 )

entry.def: Inbred means the same as inborn .

example.ex: She had that inbred politeness, it was a part of her.
example.tran: 她拥有那种天生的优雅，举手投足都彬彬有礼。

entry.tran: 同系交配的;近亲繁殖的
entry.def: People who are inbred have ancestors who are all closely related to each other.

example.ex: The whole population is so inbred that no genetic differences remain...
example.tran: 整个族群都是同系繁殖，以至于根本不存在基因差异。

example.ex: He came from an old inbred family.
example.tran: 他来自一个古老的近亲通婚的家族。
